imageurl.title: Biometric Mobile Login
imageurl.description: React Native based biometric authentication module enabling secure workforce login using face recognition with liveness detection, optimized for real-time performance.

imageurl.title: Face Capture & Liveness Detection
imageurl.description: High-performance face capture using Vision Camera with TensorFlow-powered anti-spoofing and Laplacian scoring to prevent fraudulent access attempts.

imageurl.title: QR-Based Location Verification
imageurl.description: QR scanning with hospital-restricted geofencing to ensure biometric verification occurs only within authorized departments and physical zones.

imageurl.title: Face Recognition Backend API
imageurl.description: FastAPI-based face recognition engine leveraging FAISS for sub-millisecond similarity search across employee face embeddings.

imageurl.title: Audit Logging & Persistence
imageurl.description: Dual persistence architecture using SQL Server and local endpoints to ensure compliance-ready audit logs, traceability, and system redundancy.

imageurl.title: Performance & Scalability Engine
imageurl.description: Windows-optimized backend with dynamic thread pooling, LRU caching, and health checks, scaling efficiently to 10,000+ biometric profiles.

description: A production-grade biometric verification ecosystem integrated into a Hospital Information System (HIS). The platform combines real-time mobile face recognition, liveness detection, QR-based location validation, and a high-performance FAISS-powered backend to ensure secure, compliant, and ultra-fast workforce authentication. Designed with performance-first engineering, security-by-design principles, and scalable architecture for health-critical environments.
